channel.title: docker on Turing Machines Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Turing Machines Documentation

item.title: Enable docker Remote API
item.description: In order to build image for Raspberry PI, it is sometimes usefull to be able to leverate infrastruture from a remote VM. For instance you can cross-build golang executable for ARM32v7 and transfer it to build an image on the remote PI. (used for Tiller docker image)
